page.title: 06INDUSTRY 3
page.content: In Law there is a fruit wholesaler called Strathclyde Fruit Company.They employ 5 males and 1 female worker from local areas.Their working hours are from 5a.m.till 7p.m.They send their goods to shops in Lanarkshire. There is also a distribution company employing 3 people from Law.They distribute things like soup,cider and fertiliser.It comes in by rail and is distributed all over Scotland by road. They work from 7.30a.m.till 5.30p.m. AT Coppled Recovery 4 people are employed again from local areas.They get their materials from Glasgow by lorry.They work from 8a.m.till 4.30p.m.They use wire strippers and saws.The wire is sent to Glasgow to be reused.
